==Trivia==
* This soundtrack is guaranteed to play when the player either enters the Nameless Ruins subarea or had visited it last before logging into the game. ''A Shard From Past Glories'' then plays on loop after this soundtrack finishes or after exiting combat in the subarea.
* <section begin="NamelessRuinsTheme1" />The following soundtracks share a theme:
** [[Decayed in the Darkness]]
** [[A Shard From Past Glories]]
** [[Seething Animosity]]<section end="NamelessRuinsTheme1" />
